doc:
Derek Mears https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derek_Mears 0 Derek Mears (born April 29, 1972) is an American actor and stuntman, best known for his role as Jason Voorhees in the reboot of Friday the 13th and Hawes in Hatchet III. Derek_Mears ( born April_29_,_1972 ) is an_American_actor_and_stuntman , best_known for his_role as Jason_Voorhees in the_reboot of Friday the_13th_and_Hawes in Hatchet_III .
